description:
`furo-ui5-textarea-input-labeled`
The furo-ui5-textarea-input-labeled is a composition to easily use a complete input field with label according
to the design specification of SAP Fiori Design System.
name: FuroUi5TextareaInputLabeled

members.name: focus
members.description: Focuses the underlying ui5 input element

members.name: bindData
members.description: Orchestrates the data field connection to the inside

members.name: rows
members.description: Defines the number of visible text lines for the component.

members.name: growingMaxLines
members.description: Defines the maximum number of lines that the Web Component can grow.

members.name: required
members.description: A Boolean attribute which, if present, means this field is required and marked with *.

members.name: disabled
members.description: A Boolean attribute which, if present, means this field cannot be edited by the user.

members.name: readonly
members.description: A Boolean attribute which, if present, means this field is readonly.

members.name: showExceededText
members.description:
Determines whether the characters exceeding the maximum allowed character count are visible in the furo-ui5-textarea-input.

If set to false, the user is not allowed to enter more characters than what is set in the maxlength property.
If set to true the characters exceeding the maxlength value are selected on paste and the counter below
the furo-ui5-textarea-input displays their number.

members.name: growing
members.description: Enables the furo-ui5-textarea to automatically grow and shrink dynamically with its content.

attributes.name: required
attributes.description: A Boolean attribute which, if present, means this field is required and marked with *.

attributes.description: A Boolean attribute which, if present, means this field cannot be edited by the user.

attributes.name: readonly

attributes.name: show-exceeded-text
attributes.description:
Determines whether the characters exceeding the maximum allowed character count are visible in the furo-ui5-textarea-input.

If set to false, the user is not allowed to enter more characters than what is set in the maxlength property.
If set to true the characters exceeding the maxlength value are selected on paste and the counter below
the furo-ui5-textarea-input displays their number.

attributes.name: rows
attributes.description: Defines the number of visible text lines for the component.

attributes.name: growing-max-lines
attributes.description: Defines the maximum number of lines that the Web Component can grow.

attributes.name: growing
attributes.description: Enables the furo-ui5-textarea to automatically grow and shrink dynamically with its content.
